qas.question: Who took up the path of violence?
When did the Egyptian Islamic Jihad assassinate Anwar Sadat?
Which leaders did the Islamic extremists attack?
What sin were the leaders the extremists attacked guilty of?

answers.text: promoted Western/foreign ideas and practices into Islamic societies
held secular leanings or who had introduced or promoted Western/foreign ideas and practices into Islamic societies

qas.question: Who wrote a pamphlet outlining the radical ideas of the extremists?
Who rejected the path of violence?
When did the Egyptian Islamic Jihad support Anwar Sadat?
Which leaders did the Islamic extremists not attack?

plausible_answers.text: promoted Western/foreign ideas and practices into Islamic societies

qas.question: What sin were the leaders the extremists attacked innocent of?
Who wrote a pamphlet outlining the non-radical ideas of the extremists?

context: Con đường bạo lực và cuộc đấu tranh quân sự sau đó được đưa lên bởi <a0_1> các <a0_0><a0_2><b5_0> Ai Cập Hồi giáo Jihad <a0_2/> cơ quan <b5_0/><a0_1/><a0_0/> chịu trách nhiệm cho vụ ám sát Anwar Sadat trong <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><b6_0> 1981 <b6_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> .
